EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Inquiry (1329944544.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Inquiry (1329944544.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Gerals, As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up with you after my initial phone call. My name is Nicolette Taylor and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK">online schedule. You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube. You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> who use MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you, Nicolette
